azurerm_api_management_openid_connect_pr.description: Manages an OpenID Connect Provider within a API Management Service.

name.description: the Name of the OpenID Connect Provider which should be created within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service in which this OpenID Connect Provider should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group where the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

client_id.description: The Client ID used for the Client Application.

client_secret.description: The Client Secret used for the Client Application.

display_name.description: A user-friendly name for this OpenID Connect Provider.

metadata_endpoint.description: The URI of the Metadata endpoint.

description.description: A description of this OpenID Connect Provider.

id.description: The ID of the API Management OpenID Connect Provider.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management OpenID Connect Provider.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management OpenID Connect Provider.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management OpenID Connect Provider.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management OpenID Connect Provider.
